name: Ice Lolly Lips
description:
Game works properly only FULLSCREEN.

Hey! I love icecream, sooo much! Could you cut a piece that fits my mouth perfectly? I would love thaaat! Thank you, you are fantastic <3

Made for https://itch.io/jam/mashup-game-jam with a theme: "size matters"

Controls: 

Space to cut, arrow keys to move icecream, easy, yeahhh

Team:

Jester Great: Programming, game design, particles

Nanikisunami https://nanikisunami.itch.io/: Art, audio

Game Machines: "Ouch" -sound

Tools:

Construct 3

Krita

Audacity

Photoshop

BeepBox
